title: Add About Station section for manual updates

requirements.text: Add a new 'About Station' section to the About page that displays station information with a clear indication that content can be manually updated by administrators

quotes: add about station section and i will update manual

acceptanceCriteria: A dedicated 'About Station' section is visible on the About page
The section includes placeholder text indicating it will be manually updated
The section is styled consistently with the existing Christmas-themed design

requirements.text: Create a backend data type and storage for station information including fields for title, description, and rich text content
acceptanceCriteria: StationInfo data type is defined in backend/main.mo with title and description fields
Stable storage variable holds the station information
Query function allows fetching current station information

requirements.text: Add an admin page for managing the About Station content with a form to edit title, description, and detailed information
acceptanceCriteria: New admin page accessible from Admin Dashboard for managing station info
Form includes fields for editing station title and description
Save button persists changes to the backend
Success/error notifications appear after save attempts

requirements.text: Create backend mutation function to update station information with admin authorization
acceptanceCriteria: Function accepts title and description parameters
Station information is persisted across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Add React Query hooks for fetching and updating station information
acceptanceCriteria: useGetStationInfo hook fetches current station information
useUpdateStationInfo mutation hook updates station content
Hooks follow existing patterns in useQueries.ts

requirements.text: Add navigation link to the Manage Station Info page from the Admin Dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Card or link appears on Admin Dashboard for 'Manage Station Info'
Link navigates to the new admin page
Icon and styling match existing admin dashboard items

constraints: Use existing authorization patterns from backend/main.mo for admin-only mutations
Follow existing Card component patterns from AboutPage.tsx for consistent UI
Maintain Christmas-themed styling throughout new components
nonGoals: Rich text editor or markdown support
Image uploads for station info section
